channel.description: Recent content in [Lars-Erik Cederman](https://icr.ethz.ch/people/cederman/), Luc Girardin, and Carl M端ller-Crepon, [Yannick Pengl](https://yannickpengl.com) on Carl M端ller-Crepon

item.title: Nationalism and the Transformation of the State: Border Change and Conflict in Europe and Beyond
item.description: We show how nationalism, through violent conflict and border change, caused an increasing congruence between states and nations in Europe.
